email.subject: Call for participation - 5th LATAM School in Software Engineering Research

call_for_participation.event_name: 5th LATAM School in Software Engineering Research
call_for_participation.co_located_with: CBSoft - XVI Brazilian Conference on Software: Practice and Theory

requirements: PhD or MSc students from Latin American institutions
PhD graduates in 2024 working in Latin American organizations/universities

documents_required.description: Context/Problem, Aims, Method, and Results (1-page limit)
A document with publications in journals and conferences between 2022 and 2025.

benefits: Free registration for the School (including lunch and coffee break)
Free participation in the CBSoft conference

program.description: Topics related to career and research in Software Engineering, including keynotes, panel discussions, and mentoring sessions.

keynote_topics.title: Research methodologies
keynote_topics.description: Design and execution of scientific methods in software engineering research.

keynote_topics.title: Open science
keynote_topics.description: Fostering openness, collaboration, and transparency in research.

keynote_topics.title: Industry research
keynote_topics.description: Collaboration with industry to tackle practical problems.

keynote_topics.title: Life balance and health
keynote_topics.description: Discussing mental health and work-life balance for academic researchers.

mentoring_program.description: Students grouped by topics with at least one mentor.
mentoring_program.structure: Poster presentations followed by feedback sessions.
